t: One Amazon warehouse reportedly throws out 130,000 products a week, including some that are brand new. An expert blames its giant third-party retail business.
s: July 3, 2021 - ITV News reported that one warehouse in Dunfermline, Scotland, marks 130,000 items per week for "destroy." The article echoed a 2019 French report, which said Amazon threw away 3 million items over nine months in France.
